content.rendered:
spinal needle

Two type;Quincke type and pencil type
Used in subarachnoid puncture for spinal anesthesia
The sharp casing enhanced smoothing over inter-organnizational, lower puncture resistance
Transparent hub,easy to observe the cerebrospinal fluid discharge
Hub with lock can keep the surface of needle bevel joint well
Color coded hub by size for clear recognition
Size:18G-27G Length:50-110mm
Packing: individual blister package
Steriled by Eo gas, non-toxic, non-pyrogenic, single use only

Customer special needle size per specification

 

Product Usage

This product is a sterile puncture needle, which can be used for human puncture and spinal anesthesia. The basic function is aspiration and injection. It can be used for diagnosis and treatment.

Product advantages

The disposable spine tip is specially treated specially, the needle is smooth and the linearity is good; the inner wall of the needle cavity is treated with a special surface, which not only has good uniformity but also good surface slidability, and the liquid passage resistance is very small. The unique needle design makes it not cut tissue and nerve needle during puncture, but squeeze and separate needle. The puncture needle will naturally close under the elastic packing of the tissue, and the recovery speed is greater than other types of needles, greatly reducing Tissue damage.

excerpt.rendered:
• None
  • Made in China
  • According to quantity
  • 1,000,000pcs/month

Single-use Spinal Needle
1. For epidural nerve block and subarachnoid anaesthesia on patient in clinical surgery. The sharp casing enhanced smoothing over inter-organnizational, lower puncture resistance, and the depth marking on the casing make the positioning more accurate.
2. State of the art technology is used to smooth and perfect the eliptial point to ensure easy entry into body tissues, needle sizes are colour coded, thin wall needle has a larger lumen space, due to maximumlume a thinner needle can be used for an application
